itemDescription: British politician and Governor of Bengal (1895-1943)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Arthur Herbert GCIE (16 December 1895 – 11 December 1943), born Coldbrook, Monmouthshire, Wales, to Sir Arthur James Jones-Herbert GCVO, of Llanarth, Monmouthshire, and Dame Helen Louise Gammell, of Rhode Island; died Government House, Calcutta, was a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom and a colonial governor in British India, serving as Governor of Bengal from 1939 till his death in December 1943.
